text: Cyan Pepper is an application that makes research exploration easy.
Entire fields of science can be open to you at the click of a button!
Simply search a few keywords into our engine and you'll get extensive networks of research to comb through.
It's the perfect tool for those looking to become scientists one day.
The FeatherWheel IDE combines Gedit's small footprint with Atom's powerful text manipulation.
This minimalistic text editor is the best choice for those who need to open files in a quick and efficient manner but who still want a modern IDE.
Baby Book is our flagship maternity app on Android and iOS.
Keep track of your infant's growth and development in an organized and accessible manner!
Schedule appointments, take videos, keep track of height and weight and more with BabyBook.
